Title: Freeze v1.0 Baseline Artifacts
Body: Run full test suite, generate baseline outputs from mock GEDCOM files, archive results, and tag repository as v1.0-baseline.

Title: Define Output Schema Contract
Body: Create schemas/output_schema.json defining required fields, null handling, and cardinality for all outputs.

Title: Define Entity Schema Contract
Body: Create schemas/entity_schema.json defining entity structures, identifiers, and foreign key expectations.

Title: Support Multiple NAME Records per INDI
Body: Update parser to capture and preserve multiple NAME blocks per individual (birth, married, AKA).

Title: Parse All GEDCOM Name Components
Body: Ensure NPFX, SPFX, GIVN, NICK, NSFX components are parsed and preserved distinctly.

Title: Robust Nickname Extraction
Body: Detect and normalize nicknames expressed via quotes or parentheses in NAME values.

Title: Expand EVEN Record Support
Body: Add full support for standard and custom GEDCOM EVEN records, including type, date, place, and description.

Title: Complete SOUR / REPO / NOTE / OBJE Parsing
Body: Ensure all citation, repository, note, and media structures are parsed and cross-referenced correctly.

Title: Implement Per-GEDCOM Database Creation
Body: Create one database per GEDCOM file using dynamic DB factory logic.

Title: Restore Missing GEDCOM Tables
Body: Restore places, citations, associations, and media tables required by GEDCOM 5.5.5.

Title: Enforce Foreign Key Constraints
Body: Add and enforce foreign key constraints between individuals, families, sources, and events.

Title: Add Schema Validator
Body: Implement schema_validator.py to validate DB schema before and after data insertion.

Title: Refactor Enrichment into Dedicated Module
Body: Move phonetic and romanization logic into gedcom_parser/enrichments module.

Title: Config-Driven Enrichment Control
Body: Allow enrichment features to be enabled or disabled via enrich_names_config.yml.

Title: Preserve Diacritics in Normalization
Body: Ensure accented characters are preserved unless explicitly configured otherwise.

Title: Pre-Parse GEDCOM Validation
Body: Validate GEDCOM structure, encoding, line lengths, and CONT/CONC usage before parsing.

Title: Post-Parse Schema Validation
Body: Validate parsed output against output and entity schemas.

Title: Parsing Error Report Generation
Body: Generate parsing_errors.json with line numbers, xrefs, and contextual error information.

Title: Batch Processing for Enrichment
Body: Optimize enrichment logic using batch or vectorized processing for large GEDCOM files.

Title: Progress Reporting for Long Runs
Body: Add progress indicators during long parsing operations.

Title: Log Rotation per Run
Body: Implement per-run or rotating logs to prevent unbounded growth.

Title: Remove Legacy / Redundant Code
Body: Identify and remove legacy scripts or duplicated utility code.

Title: Expand Test Coverage for New Features
Body: Add tests covering new parsing, validation, and enrichment features.

Title: Update README & CLI Documentation
Body: Update documentation to reflect v1.1 features, configs, and usage.

Title: v1.1 Changelog & Release Notes
Body: Prepare changelog and release notes summarizing v1.1 changes.
